span.span: Contains policy assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类不但可以将策略断言分组，还可枚举或修改断言组。Use the class to group together policy assertions and to enumerate or modify a group of assertions. 最常用作 类的方法的返回值。The is used most frequently as a return value for the methods of the class.
